documentation.title: Scope Closing Brace
documentation.standard: Indentation of a closing brace must match the indentation of the line containing the opening brace.

code.title: Valid: Closing brace aligned with opening brace.
Invalid: Closing brace misaligned with opening brace.
Valid: Closing brace aligned with class keyword.
Invalid: Closing brace misaligned with class keyword.
Valid: Closing brace aligned with if keyword.
Invalid: Closing brace aligned with content.

documentation.standard: Closing brace must be on a line by itself.

code.title: Invalid: No newline before closing brace.
